  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2708</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exploring water molecules and the forces between them</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschende Wassermoleküle und die Kräfte 
zwischen ihnen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Molécules d'eau les explorant et les forces 
entre eux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moléculas de água explorando e as forças entre
eles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molecole di acqua d'esplorazione e le forze fra 
loro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ερευνήσει τα μόρια ύδατος και τις δυνάμεις μεταξύ 
τους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Moléculas de agua que exploran y las fuerzas 
entre ellos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the structure and behaviour of three dimensional molecules of water (H20)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Struktur und das 
Verhalten der dreidimensionalen Moleküle des Wassers (H20) zeigt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la structure et le 
comportement des molécules tridimensionnelles de l'eau (H20)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a estrutura e o 
comportamento de moléculas tridimensionais da água (H20)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra la struttura ed il 
comportamento delle molecole tridimensionali di acqua (H20)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τη δομή και τη 
συμπεριφορά τριών διαστατικών μορίων του ύδατος (H20)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la estructura y el 
comportamiento de moléculas tridimensionales del agua (H20)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atome</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
